name: Arcade Chess
description:
Arcade Chess takes the familiar classic strategy game and twists it into the arcade genre.

Instead of taking turns, both players move their pieces simultaneously!

Instead of capturing pieces, you must attack them until their health is depleted!

As always, the goal of the game is to eliminate the opposing King. Care must be taken though, as attacking with your pieces will slowly drain their own health as well!

The game is currently in Early Access and is still in development.
Right now there is only a two-player mode and it requires two gamepads to play.
